attributes.additional_details: Follow the examples of Australia and New Zealand. Close UK borders indefinitely
attributes.background: U.K. airports are still open for commercial flights. To slow the spread of Coronavirus, we must close UK borders indefinitely. The only thing that we need to keep the borders open to is food, medicine, medical equipment and anything deemed vital to save and preserve human life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
